responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "8688B3EB4C0FDB20C961979FC65B5413", "With a call to arms, the heroes arrived, an axeman and a knight, all failed in plight. From travels far and wide, a minstrel did arrive, bringing fiddle and hope to the land undone. \"I am a piper who plays for wee ones. I make smiles wide and add a bit o\' fun.\" With tears a-flowing and sorrows aglow, the adults did say, \"We\'ve no children, nay nothing wee, all gone, taken by a priestess, hungry and mean.\" Armed with but string, flute, and dagger, the piper spoke quite loud. \"I\'ll bring the children back and the hag disemboweled!\"")
name: MADD_0007_TOF_Read_PriestessAndThePiper_10
